pr_title: try reloading the IDE main page if the first attempts fail

timeline.message: try reloading the IDE main page if the first attempts fail
static is redundant in anonymous namespace

timeline.bodyText: It feels like the problem here is that for some period of time the R session is refusing to accept connections. With this change, we will give up after trying for a total of 500ms, which feels like it might not be long enough. I think 5 retries is plenty but we might want to space them out more. How would you feel about trying this every 200ms instead (so we ultimately have a 1s grace period)?
timeline.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: That sounds good to me. I'll make that change.
replies.author: kevinushey
